explains: n. 理解力，领悟力；（听力或阅读）理解测试；包括，包含
wordGroup: reading comprehension 阅读理解；阅读测验
listening comprehension 听力理解；听懂；听力测验
comprehension and translation 理解与翻译

sentences.en: This was utterly beyond her comprehension.
sentences.cn: 这完全超出了她的理解力。

sentences.en: Is this test a good measure of reading comprehension?
sentences.cn: 这种测试是判断阅读理解力的好方法吗？

sentences.en: It's a devastating and barbaric act that defies all comprehension.
sentences.cn: 这是毁灭性的野蛮行径，完全没有方法可理解。
